criterion: Mentions DEC treatment for lymphatic filariasis
Provides information about the WHO standard for DEC treatment
Asks the user about their medical history and symptoms before providing treatment advice
Uses natural language and correct interpretation
Correctly states that DEC treatment should be administered under medical supervision
Does not suggest self-diagnosis or self-treatment for lymphatic filariasis
Mentions potential side effects of DEC treatment
Provides information about the availability of DEC treatment in Tanzania
Does not recommend DEC treatment as a cure-all for all leg swelling
Correctly states that lymphatic filariasis is a notifiable disease
